Pick Your Own Organic Produce

Experience the joy of hand-picking your own fresh organic fruits and vegetables directly from our farm! It's a fun and sustainable way to enjoy nature and take home the freshest produce possible.

What You Can Pick

  • Strawberries (May - June)
  • Blueberries (June - July)
  • Tomatoes (July - September)
  • Apples (September - October)
  • Pumpkins (October)

Plan Your Visit

Our farm is open for picking during the following hours:

  • Monday - Friday: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM
  • Saturday - Sunday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Be sure to bring your own containers, or you can purchase eco-friendly bags at our farm store.
